alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mississippi, southern Tipton and northeastern Shelby Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Joiner, or near Wilson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millington, Covington, Wilson, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Joiner, Bassett, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Gilt Edge, Barretville, Egypt, Evadale, Quito, Golden Lake, Redwood and Rosemark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee.
